content: slouchy beanie by slouchybee pattern for slightly advanced knitters gauge 22 sts + 32 rnds = 4x4 inch k1 p1 rib yarn brooklyn tweed shelter 50g 140 yards 2 skeins or malabrigo rios 100g 210 yards 1 skein needle 5mm us 7 16 inch circular or dpn and 6mm us 10 circular or dpn instructions co 80 sts on 5mm us 7 needles join in the round finish without twisting repeat pattern twice work 24 rnds in k1 p1 rib purl 12 rnds next round fold ribbing in half and purl through stitches and cast-on edge alternatively purl round and catch live sts with a double piece of yarn about 8 sew hem after hat is complete inches pull together and secure with a knot pattern turn the slouchy beanie inside out purl 1 round with 6mm us 10 needles if you want to - and it s done change color do it here abbreviations knit 6 rnds co cast on purl 2 rnds sts stitches work 6 rnds in fisherman rib as follows round round round 1 purl dpn double pointed needles round 2 p1 k1 but knit the stitch in the k knit previous round like this -> p purl repeat these 2 rnds twice more
